Package element

Interface ElementInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bomb, Coin, DynamicElement, Element, Heart, Hero, HpBar, Path, Portal, RedPath, StaticElement, Trophy, Wall
public interface ElementInterface
The Element interface is the base interface for the objects present in the maze.
Author:
Eduardo Correia, Alberto Serra, JosÃ© Carvalho
